TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Idek, title = Idek, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idek} }

S.FORM: Ci Idek wa, o kawas no Pangcah. O mimaanay ko tayal ni Idek i kakarayan, awaay to ko mafana'ay anini. Tilo ni Idek 'Adihay ko sowal no Pancah i ci Idekan. O sa'adihayay i, o "tilo ni Idek" . I roma a niyaro', o "tarakar ni Idek", o "tekar ni Idek", o "sapatiked ni Idek", ato o "pana' ni Idek" saan ko sowal.

Ci Idek wa, o kawas no Pangcah. O mimaanay ko tayal ni Idek i kakarayan, awaay to ko mafana'ay anini. Tilo ni Idek 'Adihay ko sowal no Pancah i ci Idekan. O sa'adihayay i, o "tilo ni Idek" . I roma a niyaro', o "tarakar ni Idek", o "tekar ni Idek", o "sapatiked ni Idek", ato o "pana' ni Idek" saan ko sowal.
